languages.text: "Похвальное стремление для человека, в чьих руках — судьбы миллиардов людей и десятков миров Империума. Тем бдительнее тебе надлежит быть к росткам скверны на собственных планетах — любой из них может значить скорый конец для всего, что будет опутано его корнями".

"A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."
languages.original_text: "Похвальное стремление для человека, в чьих руках — судьбы миллиардов людей и десятков миров Империума. Тем бдительнее тебе надлежит быть к росткам скверны на собственных планетах — любой из них может значить скорый конец для всего, что будет опутано его корнями".

traits.locale_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperium worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout some day and spell doom for whatever gets tangled in their roots."

"A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperium worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout some day and spell doom for whatever gets tangled in their roots."

"A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

"A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

"A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

languages.text: «Es una aspiración encomiable para alguien que tiene el destino de miles de millones de personas y docenas de mundos imperiales a su cargo. Por eso debe ser más vigilante y encontrar cualquier semilla de corrupción en sus planetas, antes de que broten y condenen todo lo que alcancen sus raíces».
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: «Es una aspiración encomiable para alguien que tiene el destino de miles de millones de personas y docenas de mundos imperiales a su cargo. Por eso debe ser más vigilante y encontrar cualquier semilla de corrupción en sus planetas, antes de que broten y condenen todo lo que alcancen sus raíces».

languages.text: “{mf|你|你}的手中掌握着几十亿人与几十个帝国世界的命运，这样的愿景值得称赞。正因如此，当你在你的行星上寻找腐化的种子时需要格外警惕。否则，有朝一日它们会生根发芽，为根须纠缠住的一切带来毁灭。”
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: “{mf|你|你}的手中掌握着几十亿人与几十个帝国世界的命运，这样的愿景值得称赞。正因如此，当你在你的行星上寻找腐化的种子时需要格外警惕。否则，有朝一日它们会生根发芽，为根须纠缠住的一切带来毁灭。”

languages.text: 「数十億の民と数十個のインペリアルワールドの運命をその手に握る方のご立派な願いです。だからこそ、惑星に腐敗の種がないか探すのであれば、今まで以上に注意しなくてはいけまえｓん。いつか芽が出て、その根に絡まったものが破滅をもたらすことがないように」
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: 「数十億の民と数十個のインペリアルワールドの運命をその手に握る方のご立派な願いです。だからこそ、惑星に腐敗の種がないか探すのであれば、今まで以上に注意しなくてはいけまえｓん。いつか芽が出て、その根に絡まったものが破滅をもたらすことがないように」

languages.text: "Ein lobenswertes Bestreben für {mf|einen Mann, der|eine Frau, die} das Schicksal von Milliarden von Menschen und Dutzenden imperialer Welten in Händen hält. Deshalb müsst ihr hinsichtlich der kleinsten Anzeichen von Korruption auf Euren Planeten umso wachsamer sein ... andernfalls breitet sie sich eines Tages aus und reißt alles in den Abgrund, was in ihre Fänge gerät."
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: "Ein lobenswertes Bestreben für {mf|einen Mann, der|eine Frau, die} das Schicksal von Milliarden von Menschen und Dutzenden imperialer Welten in Händen hält. Deshalb müsst ihr hinsichtlich der kleinsten Anzeichen von Korruption auf Euren Planeten umso wachsamer sein ... andernfalls breitet sie sich eines Tages aus und reißt alles in den Abgrund, was in ihre Fänge gerät."

languages.text: « Une aspiration louable pour quelqu'un qui tient entre ses mains le sort de milliards de personnes et de dizaines de mondes impériaux. C'est pourquoi vous devez faire preuve d'une vigilance constante pour trouver les graines de la corruption semées sur vos planètes. Autrement, elles finiront par éclore et condamneront tout ce qui est emmêlé dans leurs racines. »
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: « Une aspiration louable pour quelqu'un qui tient entre ses mains le sort de milliards de personnes et de dizaines de mondes impériaux. C'est pourquoi vous devez faire preuve d'une vigilance constante pour trouver les graines de la corruption semées sur vos planètes. Autrement, elles finiront par éclore et condamneront tout ce qui est emmêlé dans leurs racines. »

languages.text: "Milyarlarca insanın ve onlarca İmparatorluk dünyasının kaderini avucunda tutan biri için takdire değer bir tutku. Tam da bu yüzde gezegenlerindeki yozlaşma tohumları konusunda daha da dikkatli olmalısın ki bir gün filizlenip, köklerine dolaşanların sonu olmasınlar."
languages.original_text: "A commendable aspiration for a person who holds the fates of billions of people and dozens of Imperial worlds in {mf|his|her} hands. Which is why you need to be ever more vigilant when looking for seeds of corruption on your planets — lest they sprout someday and spell doom for whatever is tangled up in their roots."

traits.locale_text: "Milyarlarca insanın ve onlarca İmparatorluk dünyasının kaderini avucunda tutan biri için takdire değer bir tutku. Tam da bu yüzde gezegenlerindeki yozlaşma tohumları konusunda daha da dikkatli olmalısın ki bir gün filizlenip, köklerine dolaşanların sonu olmasınlar."
